title: Can someone explain why developing Ao Shin is so difficult?
body:
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130908073927/leagueoflegends/images/5/57/AoShin_ConceptArt.jpg

I mean making a dragon champion doesn't seem like that far of a stretch when compared to champions like:

{{champion:31}} or {{champion:421}} .  If anything it seems like it would be more down-to-earth or straight forward.  There is already a dragon in-game, and he's not super powerful, so I don't see what the problem is.  At the same time I don't see why people are so excited about him either, but to each their own.
